Text.val: 04.09.2012 AS SCR#17547 added support for Unicode control files to program, resp. codepage conversion
23.06.2011 AS SCR 11028: Changed test on OXA500 in test on GSET 4000
05.02.2009 GB SCR Small technical change for UniPaaS
05.12.2008 AS SCR#11028 special handling, named tables OXA500
11.04.2002 JJ fixed bug : cndrange TWRG_GROUP was using itself instead of par
We do work with a Unicode version of mgword.dll
It only supports control files which are UTF-16LE so we need to convert
ANSI version of mgword.dll. If Factorlink did produce a Unicode file (UTF-8) we do convert that to ANSI
For OXA500 we do use named tables,
